review:
I came for diagnosis of my heart, which was enlarged size and irregular heartbeat. After consultation, Madan suggested I go for angiogram for 100% accurate analysis.

After paying the fees, and angiogram done. He says to get the real reason behind irregular heartbeat or size I have to do some other tests.
